backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, access control, Valentine message ownership, media upload, and public media retrieval with owner-gated modifications.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected files, components, and test IDs with high‑confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Compiled summaries describing responsibilities and changes across various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Empty file placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx into a root div.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION.md: Guide outlining steps to verify, prepare, and build a preview version before promoting it to production.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md: Checklist for validating core Valentine experience in production, covering flow, gallery, lightbox, and visual checks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating welcome → quiz → memories flow and initializing release mode within providers.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Animated component generating floating heart elements with randomized positions and timing.
frontend/src/components/FloatingPetals.t: Animated component rendering falling petals with randomized positions and durations.
frontend/src/components/LocalMemoriesPic: Component allowing users to load, preview, lightbox-view, and remove local or preloaded images with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MediaGallery.tsx: Displays images and videos with error handling, deletion, downloads, and a lightbox viewer.
frontend/src/components/MediaUpload.tsx: Handles authenticated media uploads with validation, previews, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/MemoryLightbox.t: Presents a modal lightbox to view a full-size image with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Initializes and plays looping background audio with simple start control.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity management, and an authentication context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating love letters and media via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a Valentine-themed light/dark color palette and typography rules.
frontend/src/lib/queryClient.ts: Exports a preconfigured React Query client with default stale time and focus behavior settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CustomizeMessage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineMessage.tsx: Displays a love letter with fallback content and an optional memories gallery toggle.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineQuestion.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineQuiz.tsx: Interactive quiz component that advances through questions and triggers a completion callback.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineWelcome.tsx: Welcome screen that starts background music and transitions to the next step.
frontend/src/utils/releaseMode.ts: Cleans preview-related URL parameters and initializes sanitized release mode.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/valentine/loveLetter.ts: Exports the default love letter text used as a fallback.
frontend/src/valentine/preloadedMemories: Provides a list of default image paths for the memories feature.
frontend/src/valentine/quizData.ts: Defines the quiz question objects and answer keys.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom valentine theme colors and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, features, architectural notes, and known issues for a Valentine-themed interactive quiz site. Contains state metadata plus lists of existing features, outstanding problems, and user-approved version info.
